section.name: HL7 Colourizer
section.p: This page takes an ER7 encoded HL7 message and gives you a nice colourful version. This can be useful if you need to include message snippets in email, documentation, etc. You can copy and paste from the colourized window below right into Outlook, Word, etc.
Note that no information is transmitted to a remote server, as this page works purely with JavaScript, so your information is safe.
